titles: The Protestant joyners ghost to Hone the Protestant carpenter in Newgate With his confession.
author: Hone, William, d. 1683, attributed name.
Colledge, Stephen, 1635?-1681, attributed name.
notes: Imprint from colophon; place of printing from Wing.
An imaginary dialogue between William Hone, "the Protestant carpenter", and Stephen College, "the Protestant joiner", both of whom were executed for plotting against King Charles II.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
keywords: Hone, William, d. 1683 --  Fiction --  Early works to 1800.
